original_title: Sri Lanka’s mid day shares edge up
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares edged up in mid day trade, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was up 0.01 percent or 0.68 points to 9,015.51, while the most liquid index S&P SL20 was up 0.04 percent or 0.91 points to 2,549.25.
“The market is influenced by positive economic indicators such as policy rate cuts and lowered inflation,” an analyst said.
Top gainers in mid day trade were Expolanka, Hatton National Bank & John Keells Holdings. (Colombo/June13/2023)
